short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a QR code for the URL of the active tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with the QR Code Generator Chrome extension! This simple yet powerful tool allows you to create QR codes for any webpage URL directly from your browser, making it easier than ever to share links across devices or with friends and colleagues.

Key Features:
1. Generate QR Codes Instantly:

With just one click, generate a QR code for the URL of the active tab. Perfect for quickly sharing web pages without the need to type out long URLs.
2. Easy Download Option:

Download the generated QR code as a high-quality PNG image. Simply click the download button, and save the QR code to your device for future use.
3. Seamless Sharing:

Utilize the built-in sharing functionality to share QR codes directly from your browser. Whether you want to send the code via email, message, or another app, sharing is straightforward and hassle-free.
4. User-Friendly Interface:

The clean and intuitive design ensures that generating and sharing QR codes is a smooth and enjoyable experience. No technical knowledge required!
5. Lightweight and Efficient:

The extension is lightweight and efficient, ensuring it does not slow down your browsing experience. It's designed to be fast and responsive, providing QR codes almost instantaneously.
How It Works:

Click on the QR Code Generator icon in your Chrome toolbar.
The extension will automatically generate a QR code for the URL of your active tab.
View the QR code directly in the popup window.
Use the "Download QR Code" button to save the QR code as a PNG image.
Use the "Share QR Code" button to share the QR code through your preferred apps.
Use Cases:
1. Share Webpages:

Quickly share web pages from your desktop to your mobile device without needing to type long URLs.
2. Classroom and Presentations:

Display QR codes during presentations or lectures to provide attendees with quick access to additional resources or information.
3. Marketing and Promotions:

Use QR codes in marketing materials to direct customers to your website or promotional content effortlessly.
4. Personal Use:

Bookmark web pages in a physical format by printing QR codes and attaching them to your notes or documents.
Why Choose QR Code Generator?

Convenience: Generate QR codes on-the-fly without leaving your browser.
Efficiency: Save time and effort when sharing URLs across multiple devices or with multiple people.
Reliability: Depend on a tool that provides consistent and high-quality QR code generation.
Install QR Code Generator today and make sharing URLs a breeze! Whether you're a student, professional, or casual user, this extension is a must-have tool for your Chrome browser
